DynamicPage.Title: AjGenesis Project
DynamicPage.Content:
[[http://www.ajlopez.com/ajgenesis|AjGenesis]] an open source project, written in VB.NET 2.0.
[[image:http://www.ajlopez.com/ajgenesis/AjGenesisDrawings01-01.gif]]
You can download the latests version from [[http://www.codeplex.com/ajgenesis|Codeplex AjGenesis Page]].
There is a web discussion forum at [[http://www.codeplex.com/ajgenesis/Thread/List.aspx|CodePlex]] (English language).
There is a [[http://groups.google.com/group/codegeneration?hl=es|Code Generation Google Group]] (Spanish language) to discuss different strategies to code generation.
